checks.title: Content negotiation for RDF and HTML
checks.explanation: Ontology available in: HTML, RDF
checks.description: This check verifies of the ontology URI is published following the right content negotiation for RDF and HTML

checks.title: Persistent URL
checks.explanation: Ontology URI is not using a persistent id. We checked w3id, purl, DOI and W3C
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has a persistent URL (w3id, purl, DOI, or a W3C URL)

checks.title: Ontology URI is resolvable
checks.explanation: Ontology URL is resolvable in application/rdf+xml
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology URI found within the ontology document is resolvable

checks.title: HTML availability
checks.explanation: Ontology available in HTML
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has an HTML documentation

checks.title: RDF Availability
checks.explanation: Ontology available in RDF
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology has an RDF serialization (ttl, n3, rdf/xml, json-ld)

checks.title: Minimum metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: title, version iri, author, namespace URI
checks.description: This check verifies if the The following  minimum metadata [title, description, license, version iri, creator, creationDate, namespace URI] are present in the ontology

checks.title: Recommended metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: namespace prefix, creation date, citation. Warning: The following OPTIONAL recommended metadata could not be found: contributor. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if the following recommended metadata [NS Prefix, version info, creation date, citation] are present in the ontology. It also checks if [contributor] is present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have a contributor)

checks.title: Detailed metadata
checks.explanation: The following metadata was not found: doi, logo, status, source. Warning: The following OPTIONAL detailed metadata could not be found: backwards compatibility, modified. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if the following detailed metadata [doi, publisher, logo, status, source, issued date] are present in the ontology. It also checks if [previous version, backward compatibility, modified] are present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have, e.g., a previous version)

checks.title: License availability
checks.explanation: A license was found Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License (CC-BY-SA 4.0) http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/4.0
checks.description: This check verifies if a license associated with the ontology

checks.title: License is resolvable
checks.explanation: The license used could not be resolved
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology license is resolvable

checks.title: Basic provenance metadata
checks.explanation: The following provenance information was not found: creation date, author. Warning: The following OPTIONAL provenance metadata could not be found: contributor. Please consider adding them if appropriate.
checks.description: This check verifies if basic provenance is available for the ontology: [author, creation date]. This check also verifies whether [contributor, previous version] are present, but with no penalty (as no all ontologies may have a previous version or a contributor)

checks.title: Detailed provenance metadata
checks.explanation: All detailed provenance metadata found!
checks.description: This check verifies if detailed provenance information is available for the ontology: [issued date, publisher]

checks.title: Ontology prefix
checks.explanation: Prefix declaration not found in the ontology
checks.description: This check verifies if an ontology prefix is available

checks.title: Prefix is in registry
checks.explanation: No prefix declared in the ontology
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology prefix can be found in prefix.cc or LOV registries. This check also verifies if the prefix resolves to the same namespaceprefix found in the ontology.

checks.title: Ontology in metadata registry
checks.explanation: Ontology not found in a public registry
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology can be found in a public registry (LOV)

checks.title: Metadata are accessible, even when ontology is not
checks.explanation: Ontology not found in a public registry
checks.description: Metadata are accessible even when the ontology is no longer available. Since the metadata is usually included in the ontology, this check verifies whether the ontology is registered in a public metadata registry (LOV)

checks.title: Open protocol
checks.explanation: The ontology uses an open protocol
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology uses an open protocol (HTTP or HTTPS)

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse (metadata)
checks.explanation: Ontology reuses existing vocabularies for declaring metadata.
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology reuses other vocabularies for declaring metadata terms

checks.title: Vocabulary reuse
checks.explanation: The ontology imports the following vocabularies:
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology imports/extends other vocabularies (besides RDF, OWL and RDFS)

checks.title: Documentation: labels
checks.explanation: No ontology terms found
checks.description: This check verifies the extent to which all ontology terms have labels (rdfs:label in OWL vocabularies, skos:prefLabel in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Documentation: definitions
checks.explanation: No ontology terms found
checks.description: This check verifies whether all ontology terms have descriptions (rdfs:comment in OWL vocabularies, skos:definition in SKOS vocabularies)

checks.title: Version IRI
checks.explanation: Version IRI  not defined
checks.description: This check verifies if there is an id for this ontology version, and whether the id is unique (i.e., different from the ontology URI)

checks.title: Version IRI resolves
checks.explanation: Version IRI is not available, so it could not be resolved
checks.description: This check verifies if the version IRI resolves

checks.title: Consistent ontology IDs
checks.explanation: Ontology URI is different from ontology ID. Your ontologyURI (e.g., its w3id) should be the same as the one used within the ontology itself. Ontology URI: https://elsst.cessda.eu/id/5. Provided URI: https://thesauri.cessda.eu/rest/v1/elsst-5/data?format=text/turtle
checks.description: This check verifies if the ontology URI is equal to the ontology ID
